ShortName: Pipe design pressure must be greater than operating pressure.
Pressure drop entered greater than operating pressure!
Pressure drop entered produces an output pressure below atmospheric pressure.
Flow velocity less than 0.1m/s - this is very slow.
Flow velocity greater than 100m/s - this is very fast.
Beta lower than recommended in Shell Flow Meter Engineering Handbook (2nd Edition).
Beta higher than recommended in Shell Flow Meter Engineering Handbook (2nd Edition).
Bore of less than 1.5mm - please confirm manufacturing details with factory.
Plate thickness exceeds upper limit (6*bore) for critical flow orifice computation as per Miller.
Isentropic index out of normal range
Please supply Pipe Support Diameter (must be >= ID)
Drain/Vent only applicable if pipe internal diameter > 100mm
Drain/Vent cannot be greater than 1/10th of bore
A minimum of 3½D separation between each stage is recommended
